original_text: Then God appeared to Laban the Aramean in a dream at night. God warned him, ‘Be careful what you say to Jacob. Do not say anything good or bad to him.’
korean_text: 밤에 하나님이 아람 사람 라반에게 현몽하여 이르시되 너는 삼가 야곱에게 선악간에 말하지 말라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: Then God appeared to Laban the Aramean
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하나님은 아람 사람 라반에게 나타나셨다

sentences.original_text: Be careful what you say to Jacob
Do not say anything good or bad to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 좋은 것이나 나쁜 것을 말하지 말라
